creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in a wide rimmed hat and long dark pants; he sits in the foreground; A large tripod-like object on his L; a barren tree on his R; the words "An Occasion for Hope." inscribed, UC

medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "An Occasion for Hope", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
